services.name: Initial Consultation
services.description: First visit including full assessment and treatment plan discussion.

services.name: Follow-up Visit
services.description: Standard check-up on ongoing conditions or treatment adjustments.

services.name: Prescription Renewal
services.description: Quick visit for existing patients needing prescription refills (requires prior consultation).

services.name: Minor Procedure
services.description: Simple procedures like mole removal, etc. Price determined after consultation.

payment_info: Payment due at time of service. Accepts cash and major credit cards.
